description:
Connecting dApps with Wallets. 
One SDK for Tezos dApp developers to seamlessly connect to multiple wallets.

Beacon SDK supports Browser, Mobile, Desktop, Web and Hardware wallets.

# Plugin Features:
- Connect/Disconnect wallet
- Sign a message
- Send XTZ
- Dark/Light theme
- Set preferred network

Supported networks:
Mainnet, Ghostnet, Kathmandunet

[b]Demo:[/b]
https://ezplugins-demo-3.bubbleapps.io/version-test/tezos

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Join the Web3 NoCode community on [b]Discord[/b]: https://discord.gg/GHSTa8H8Cb
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
name: Tezos - Beacon NoCode SDK
plugin_instructions:
Add the plugin element called "Beacon SDK" on the page. Make sure it is visible and not in a popup or a hidden group.
Open demo page in app editor for reference.
Contact us on Discord if you need help

If you don't have a Tezos wallet, you can use Templewallet, download it here:

https://templewallet.com/download
